name: Urbanhire
description: Urbanhire As an IT Consulting expert, provides strategic guidance to businesses seeking to harness technology for growth and innovation.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Your hiring journey simplified
ShortDescription: Urbanhire innovates recruitment process to yield best results to the businesses.

Highlights.name: CONSULTING SERVICES
Highlights.description: Urban Hire offers recruiting, prospecting, IT solutions from small, medium & large firms serving many of the world’s leading companies. Discover advanced, innovative Recruitment strategies and processes which allows them to remain focused on their core business.

Highlights.name: STAFFING SOLUTIONS
Highlights.description: We help companies cater their requirements towards present trending technologies, UI and UX resolutions for their website and would help them add a pinch of essence with new Unique Innovative solution which adds value to them in the current market.

enhanced_description: Urbanhire provides a SaaS-based HR technology solution, primarily featuring an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) to innovate and simplify the recruitment process. Aimed at boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, the platform helps businesses hire top talent faster and more efficiently, while reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees. Beyond its software offering, Urbanhire also functions as an IT Consulting expert, delivering strategic guidance, advanced recruitment strategies, prospecting services, and staffing solutions to small, medium, large, and global enterprise firms seeking to leverage technology for growth and efficient talent acquisition.
competitive_advantages: Combines proprietary HR technology (Applicant Tracking System) with professional consulting services, including IT solutions, strategic recruitment guidance, and staffing services, offering a holistic approach to talent acquisition and business growth.
roi_benefits: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Yield best recruitment results for businesses
